joelib2.gui.util
Interface ToolTipInfo

public interface ToolTipInfo

Tool tip information for chart visualisations.

Author:
  • wegnerj 21. März 2002

Method Summary
 String getHTMLInfo(double x, double y)
          Gets the tool tip text.
 String getType()
          Gets the information type for this tool tip, e.g "infrared data"
 

Method Detail

getHTMLInfo

String getHTMLInfo(double x,
                   double y)
Gets the tool tip text. Returns HTML code without the <html> and </html> tokens.

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate in a chart visualisation
y - the y coordinate in a chart visualisation
Returns:
the HTML tool tip text

getType

String getType()
Gets the information type for this tool tip, e.g "infrared data"

Returns:
the information type
